survey_name: Electric Vehicle Charging Infrastructure Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from electric vehicle (EV) owners regarding their satisfaction with existing charging infrastructure, identifying pain points and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What type of EV charging station do you most frequently use?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What type of EV charging station do you most frequently use?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of EV charging stations in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of EV charging stations in your area?

questions.question_text: What are the main challenges you face when using public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture all relevant challenges.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What are the main challenges you face when using public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How important is the speed of charging when selecting a public EV charging station?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to gauge the importance of charging speed.

script.question_text: How important is the speed of charging when selecting a public EV charging station?

questions.question_text: Do you use any mobile apps or platforms to locate EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to determine app usage.

script.question_text: Do you use any mobile apps or platforms to locate EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: If yes, which apps or platforms do you use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections for apps/platforms used.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: If yes, which apps or platforms do you use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the pricing of public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction with pricing.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the pricing of public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in EV charging infrastructure? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture desired improvements.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in EV charging infrastructure? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a premium for faster or more reliable charging?
questions.client_notes: Include a 'Maybe' option to capture conditional willingness.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a premium for faster or more reliable charging?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend public EV charging stations to other EV owners?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure likelihood of recommendation.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend public EV charging stations to other EV owners?

questions.question_text: Please share any additional comments or suggestions regarding EV charging infrastructure.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: Please share any additional comments or suggestions regarding EV charging infrastructure.
